channel.title: Really strange webclient
channel.description:
Ill just made a webclient "Universe-Scape" [URL=http://"http://www.softcube.nl/server/client.html"]http://www.softcube.nl/server/client.html[/URL]
It loads perfectly etc. but the problem is it cant load sources when i login i only see the frame of runescape, the play screen is black
The only source that works is a source that has a base of dodian(very strange) I am using client: Project Cleansource
So i want that my webclient can run other source then dodian based sources too.
Can anybody help me? Mail me at [email]8moonbeam8@gmail.com[/email] Thanks..
P.S. Non-signing+jarring it works, signing+jarring it doesnt work anymore!
Btw here is a picuter when i login and a picture what the runserver.bat shows us [IMG]http://softcube.nl/server/error.JPG[/img] Its just black! After 5 seconds this shows up in runserver (see below) [IMG]http://softcube.nl/server/error2.JPG[/img]

item.title: Really strange webclient
item.dc:creator: @moonbeamer moonbeamer
item.description:
@moonbeamer wrote:

Ill just made a webclient “Universe-Scape”
http://www.softcube.nl/server/client.html

It loads perfectly etc.
but the problem is it cant load sources
when i login i only see the frame of runescape, the play screen is black

The only source that works is a source that has a base of dodian(very strange)
I am using client: Project Cleansource

So i want that my webclient can run other source then dodian based sources too.

Can anybody help me? Mail me at 8moonbeam8@gmail.com
Thanks…

P.S. Non-signing+jarring it works, signing+jarring it doesnt work anymore!

Btw here is a picuter when i login and a picture what the runserver.bat shows us

Its just black! After 5 seconds this shows up in runserver (see below)
